pages.text: Before you can move on to the next technological advance you need to manufacture $(item)Lubrication$(), yes you heard me, Lube.$(br2)To start off you will need a good supply of $(item)fish$(), yes, $(item)fish$().$(br2)Now being a caveman and all your first reaction might be to go fish with a $(item)rod$(), please don't.
Will catch $(item)fish$() when placed over a body of water and supplied with power. Very efficient.

pages.title: Centrifuge
pages.text: The centrifugal separator can break down products into their base components. In this case you will need to use it to separate bones and $(item)Fish Oil$() from the fish you have caught.

pages.title: Fractionating Still
pages.text: An industrial still, use it to turn the $(item)Fish Oil$() into $(item)Salt$() and $(item)Lubricant$().

Coat a $(item)Compressed Iron Gear$() with $(item)Lubricant$() in a $(item)Fluid Transposer$() to make $(item)Lubricated Gears$().$(br2)This crafting component is used a lot, so don't neglect automating them.
